title: Basil & Indian Foreign Minister discuss economic cooperation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa called on Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankara on Wednesday (16).
According to the External Affairs Minister, the duo held productive discussions on economic partnership.
He said that India will continue to respond to the requirements of the people of Sri Lanka.
Sri Lanka will continue talks with IMF on its debt obligations, says President
